To conduct a denial-of-service attack through fraudulent firmware updates

Pharming requires an email to be sent to lure the victim, whereas phishing does not
Pharming involves using voice-based deception, while phishing relies on fake websites
Pharming is exclusively conducted over SMS rather than email
